price: Wakaasi amri ya Mola wao Mlezi. Basi uliwanyakua moto wa radi nao wanaona.
arabic: فَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ
footnotes: Na katika kisa cha Thamudi ipo Ishara. Walipo ambiwa: Stareheni katika majumba yenu kwa muda maalumu. Wakajivuna na wakatakabari wasifuate amri ya Mola wao Mlezi. Basi radi ikawaangamiza nao wanaiona kwa macho yao inavyo tokea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faʿataw ʿan amri rabbihim fa-akhadhathumu al-ṣāʿiqatu wahum yanẓurūna
